description:
Hi,

I'm trying to troubleshoot an issue using the "Publish Quality Gate Result" step from TFS (on-site).
We've been using the code analysis for a while now with no issues.

The error is showing up on the "Prepare analysis on SonarQube" step.

2018-05-16T15:38:47.4448709Z ##[error][SQ] Could not fetch metrics
2018-05-16T15:38:47.4448709Z ##[error][SQ] API GET '/api/metrics/search' failed, error was: {"code":"UNABLE_TO_GET_ISSUER_CERT_LOCALLY"}
2018-05-16T15:38:51.6451219Z ##[error][SQ] API GET '/api/ce/task' failed, error was: {"code":"UNABLE_TO_GET_ISSUER_CERT_LOCALLY"}

The "Prepare analysis on SonarQube" and "Run Code Analysis" steps run without issue.

We do have internal CA certs on TFS and Sonarqube, so I'm having some trouble figuring out who is making request and what CA's might need to be updated.

Googleing the message is mostly returning node and git results, which don't seem to apply.

Any help would be appreciated!

Thanks,
Ben
